--- title: "Sheffield Half Marathon" date: "2013-05-12" author: "Adrian Joseph" image: https://storage.googleapis.com/blogs_josa/sport/2013-05-12_SHEFFIELD_HALF_MARATHON/img/00.png categories: [race report, run] format: html lightbox: match: auto effect: fade desc-position: right loop: false --- ![](https://storage.googleapis.com/blogs_josa/sport/2013-05-12_SHEFFIELD_HALF_MARATHON/img/00.png) Another home half marathon. My second ever, and I do not remember much about it, since all Sheffield Half Marathon are pretty similar. And that was a good thing, becuse it was a nice city route with a lot of cheering spectators. ::: {.cell} ::: {.cell-output-display} ```{=html}
